page.title: 08PROVIDENCE HOUSE
page.content: Nowadays{Providence House}is used as a public{library}and an{adult education {centre.}The library has, on average, 100 visitors a day and the adult education centre offers a wide variety of daytime and evening classes. Providence House was built in the 19th.Century and has been used as a private house, an orphanage and a school. There are many stories told about life in the{orphanage.}Recent visitors recalled a story about a boy who was made to sit in a baby's high chair each mealtime for 3 days as a punishment for crying. Another man visiting the library noticed an alteration in the ceiling and remembered how he and his friends used to crawl along the false roof and watch the matron in the bathroom through a hole in the ceiling.
